name: dark-mode-for-outlook
description: A browser extension/add-on that applies a better (unofficial) dark mode to Microsoft Outlook and removes the ad sidebar

scripts.clean: rm -rf build && mkdir -p build && (echo "✓ CLEANED" && exit 0) || (echo "✗ ERROR WHILE CLEANING" && exit 1)
scripts.build:css: SASSPATH=$(npm bin): $SASSPATH node-sass styles/main.scss build/main.css --style=compressed --no-source-map && SASSPATH=$(npm bin): $SASSPATH node-sass styles/help.scss build/help.css --style=compressed --no-source-map && (echo "✓ CSS PACKED" && exit 0) || (echo "✗ ERROR WHILE PACKING CSS" && exit 1)
scripts.build:js: browserify scripts/modified.js -p tinyify -o build/script.js && (echo "✓ JS PACKED" && exit 0) || (echo "✗ ERROR WHILE PACKING JS" && exit 1)
scripts.compress: imagemin *.png --plugin=optipng --out-dir=build && (echo "✓ IMAGES COMPRESSED" && exit 0) || (echo "✗ ERROR WHILE COMPRESSING IMAGES" && exit 1)
scripts.copy: cp -r README.md LICENSE.md manifest.json _locales build/ && npm run --silent build:css && npm run --silent build:js && npm run --silent compress && (echo "✓ FILES COPIED" && exit 0) || (echo "✗ ERROR WHILE COPYING FILES" && exit 1)
scripts.zip: cd build/ && zip -r dark-mode-for-outlook.zip * && (echo "✓ FILES ZIPPED" && exit 0) || (echo "✗ ERROR WHILE ZIPPING FILES" && exit 1)
scripts.build: npm run --silent clean && npm run --silent copy && npm run --silent zip && time="`date +%T`" && (echo "✓ BUILD COMPLETE ("$time")" && exit 0) || (echo "✗ ERROR WHILE BUILDING" && exit 1)

author: John Goodliff
